Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to telemarketing
Summary: Adds text messages to provisions regarding telemarketing and provides for increased caller identification transparency for certain types of telemarketing activity.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-z, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to telemarketing
